photos.title: Mayor's Mansion
photos.description: The grand mansion where the town mayor resides, overlooking the bustling streets of Saint Denis.

photos.title: Braithwaite Manor
photos.description: The elegant estate of the Braithwaite family, surrounded by rolling hills and ancient oak trees.

photos.title: Bronte's Mansion
photos.description: Angelo Bronte's luxurious residence in the heart of Saint Denis, filled with wealth and secrets.

photos.title: Beecher's Hope
photos.description: A peaceful ranch where dreams of a simple life away from the outlaw world take shape.

photos.title: Shady Belle
photos.description: The gang's hideout in the swamplands, providing shelter among the cypress trees and gators.

photos.title: Carmody Dell
photos.description: A quiet homestead nestled in the valley, where honest folk try to make an honest living.

photos.title: Guthrie Farm
photos.description: Rolling pastures and fertile fields where cattle graze under the endless western sky.

photos.title: The Loft
photos.description: An urban dwelling high above the city streets, offering views of the changing times.

photos.title: Robard Farm
photos.description: A working farm where the Robard family tends to their crops and livestock with dedication.
